author: Joe Brennan
title: Central Bank to press insurers on customer rights amid Covid-19 stand-off
description: Firms with business interruption cover being told they are not eligible for compensation
content:
The Central Bank will write to insurers in the coming days to press them to offer fair settlements to customers who are entitled to payouts on claims related to Covid-19, according to sources. 
The regulator is also engaging with peers across Europe and the … [+2485 chars]
